title: Spiral Matrix Traversal
algorithmDescription: Traverse matrix in spiral order using boundary simulation
detailedDescription: Traverse m×n matrix in spiral order (clockwise from outside to inside). Input: First line has m and n. Next m lines have n space-separated integers. Output: Elements in spiral order, space-separated. Maintain boundaries: top, bottom, left, right.
hints: Track four boundaries: top, bottom, left, right
Traverse right on top row, then increment top
Traverse down on right column, then decrement right
Traverse left on bottom row, then decrement bottom
Traverse up on left column, then increment left
solutionApproach: Initialize boundaries. While boundaries valid: traverse right across top, down right side, left across bottom (if rows remain), up left side (if columns remain). Update boundaries after each direction.
testCaseCriteria: Must visit all elements in correct spiral order. Should handle rectangular matrices and edge cases (1×n, n×1, 1×1).
